title: NLCS: Philadelphia Embraces Bryce Harper as Leader of Phillies
description: Bryce Harper is on a roll for the Phillies, and is deeper into the playoffs than he has ever been. The bond between him and his teamâ€™s home city continues to deepen.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Bill Streicher/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: As the Philadelphia Phillies celebrated their win over the Atlanta Braves in Game 4 of their division series, Bryce Harper made sure to acknowledge the fans at Citizens Bank Park.
